overview: From 2025-10-18 to 2025-10-19, ethereum-optimism/Retro-Funding had 0 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 3 active contributors.

topContributors.summary: geoknee: Focused on critical infrastructure improvements, opening three PRs including "op-batcher: exit process on criticial throttling RPC error" (ethereum-optimism/optimism#17924) and "add Test_ProgramAction_OperatorFeeFixTransition" (ethereum-optimism/optimism#17925), demonstrating a strong emphasis on bug fixes and other foundational work across both code and tests.

0xniha: Focused on feature development, opening a significant PR (ethereum-optimism/optimism#17922) to add a custom configuration intent, which involved modifying 5 files with a net addition of 169 lines of code and tests.

Wazabie: Focused on expanding testnet configurations, opening two PRs (ethereum-optimism/superchain-ops#1256, ethereum-optimism/superchain-ops#1255) to add and configure a new game type for the Soneium Testnet, demonstrating a primary focus on other work, with code changes primarily in tests and documentation.

kansas1295: Focused on configuration work, modifying 594 files with significant changes (+26165/-9196 lines) across 3 commits, and has two open pull requests, "Test contribute" (ethereum-optimism/optimism#17923) and "build(deps): bump next" (ethereum-optimism/ecosystem#965).
opgitgovernance: Focused on enhancing testing reliability by opening a PR in ethereum-optimism/optimism#17921 to address test flakiness and promote test stability, alongside making two PR comments.
maurelian: Focused on bugfix work, making 2 commits that modified 13 files with a net addition of 288 lines, and also provided one review comment.
